mapper.sql: cggoods.gd_id as cggoods_gd_id, cggoods.supplier_id as cggoods_supplier_id, cggoods.gd_name as cggoods_gd_name, cggoods.gd_price as cggoods_gd_price, cggoods.gd_number as cggoods_gd_number, cggoods.gd_guige as cggoods_gd_guige, cggoods.gd_type as cggoods_gd_type, cggoods.gd_total as cggoods_gd_total, cggoods.bz as cggoods_bz
mapper.insert: insert into cggoods (supplier_id, gd_name, gd_price, gd_number, gd_guige, gd_type, gd_total, bz) values (#{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd_price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gd_number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gd_guige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd_total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cggoods
supplier_id,
gd_name,
gd_price,
gd_number,
gd_guige,
gd_type,
gd_total,
bz,
#{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gd_price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gd_number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gd_guige,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gd_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gd_total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cggoods
supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_name = #{gd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_price = #{gd_price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_number = #{gd_number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gd_guige = #{gd_guige,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_type = #{gd_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gd_total = #{gd_total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where gd_id = #{gd_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cggoods set supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_name = #{gd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_price = #{gd_price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_number = #{gd_number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gd_guige = #{gd_guige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_type = #{gd_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gd_total = #{gd_total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where gd_id = #{gd_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select c.gd_id,c.gd_name,c.gd_price,c.gd_number,c.gd_total,s.supplier_name from cggoods c LEFT JOIN supplier s on c.supplier_id=s.supplier_id

select c.gd_id,c.gd_name,c.gd_price,c.gd_number,c.gd_total,s.supplier_name from cggoods c LEFT JOIN supplier s on c.supplier_id=s.supplier_id
where gd_name like '%${gdName}%'
